Row.Text: Gain extra yields in the capital when a [ICON_GreatPerson]Great Person is activated and for every turn after for the rest of the game.
[ICON_GreatGeneral]Great Generals are earned at twice the normal rate and spawn with bonus military units. Gain 1 unit for every 5 population in your [ICON_Capital]capital.

Neighborhood replacement unique to the Ainu available at Sanitation. Grants bonus [ICON_Culture]Culture and [ICON_Food]Food for each adjacent Woods and Mountains. Grants bonus [ICON_Culture]Culture, [ICON_Gold]Gold and [ICON_Science] for adjacent Natural Wonders.
Ranged unit which is unique to the Ainu. Replaces the archer and can move through woods unhindered.
